member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.#ctor(System.Reflection.ReflectionContext)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified reflection context as a base.
member.param: The reflection context to use as a base.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.AddProperties(System.Type)
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, provides a collection of additional properties for the specified type, as represented in this reflection context.
member.param: The type to add properties to.
member.returns: A collection of additional properties for the specified type.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.CreateProperty(System.Type,System.String,System.Func{System.Object,System.Object},System.Action{System.Object,System.Object})
member.summary: Creates an object that represents a property to be added to a type, to be used with the method.
member.param: The type of the property to create.
The name of the property to create.
An object that represents the property's accessor.
An object that represents the property's accessor.
member.returns: An object that represents the property.

member.summary: Creates an object that represents a property to be added to a type, to be used with the method and using the specified custom attributes.
member.param: The type of the property to create.
The name of the property to create.
An object that represents the property's accessor.
An object that represents the property's accessor.
A collection of custom attributes to apply to the property.
A collection of custom attributes to apply to the property's accessor.
A collection of custom attributes to apply to the property's accessor.
member.returns: An object that represents the property.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.GetCustomAttributes(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, provides a list of custom attributes for the specified member, as represented in this reflection context.
member.param: The member whose custom attributes will be returned.
A collection of the member's attributes in its current context.
member.returns: A collection that represents the custom attributes of the specified member in this reflection context.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.GetCustomAttributes(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Object})
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, provides a list of custom attributes for the specified parameter, as represented in this reflection context.
member.param: The parameter whose custom attributes will be returned.
A collection of the parameter's attributes in its current context.
member.returns: A collection that represents the custom attributes of the specified parameter in this reflection context.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.MapAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Gets the representation, in this reflection context, of an assembly that is represented by an object from another reflection context.
member.param: The external representation of the assembly to represent in this context.
member.returns: The representation of the assembly in this reflection context.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.Context.CustomReflectionContext.MapType(System.Reflection.TypeInfo)
member.summary: Gets the representation, in this reflection context, of a type represented by an object from another reflection context.
member.param: The external representation of the type to represent in this context.
member.returns: The representation of the type in this reflection context.
